Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

The following are a few books regarding the life of the Prophet Muhammed (saw):

 

 

 

1.     Sirat un Nabi written by Allama Shibli Nomani & Sayed Suleman Nadvi

 

2.    The Sealed Nector – Biography of the Noble Prophet. Written by Safiur – Rahman Al-   Mubarakpuri

 

3.    The Ways of the holy Prophet Muhammad (SAW) written by Arif Billah Maulana Dr. Abdul hai

 

4.    Discourses on Islamic way of life – written by Justice Mufti Muhammad Taqi Usmani

 

 

 

 Below are a few tips on how to improve the family lifestyle:

 

·        Stay stead fast on your deen

 

·        Make dua

 

·        Show good character towards your family

 

·        with hikma remind your family over and over again about religion

 

·        don’t take part in there gossips

 

 

 

It is narrated by Ibn Mas’ood (radhiyallahoanha) that the holy Prophet (saw) recited the verse of the Holy Quran which says:

 

 

 

“the disobedient and the transgressors among the bani israa-eel were accursed by Allah.” 

 

 

 

On this the holy Prophet(saw) emphatically instructed his companions:

 

 

 

“(to avoid such decline) you people must enjoin upon others to do good deeds and prevent them from doing forbidden things: you should restrain every tyrant from tyranny and invite them towards truth and justice.”

 

 

 

2) The verse “some children of his people” is talking about the Bani Israil and the magicians were not from the Bani Israil.  The magicians came from all over the county.
